title: "Jargon Buster: Ecosystem Services" meta: In the spirit of clear communication, we are starting a series of jargon buster blog posts, which aim to demystify some of the more obscure terms used by the conservation community. In this second instalment, Kristi Foster explains just what we mean by ‘ecosystem services’. category: general author: Kristi Foster
